remarks: The norm of a negated element is the same as the norm of the original element.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmf.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
nmf.n $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
nminv.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
nminv $p |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( I ` A ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) $.
